```scss
// Property: visibility
// Component(s): Ti.Android.Notification, Ti.Calendar.Event
'.visibility-private': { visibility: Ti.Android.VISIBILITY_PRIVATE }
'.visibility-public': { visibility: Ti.Android.VISIBILITY_PUBLIC }
'.visibility-secret': { visibility: Ti.Android.VISIBILITY_SECRET }
'.visibility-calendar-confidential': { visibility: Ti.Calendar.VISIBILITY_CONFIDENTIAL }
'.visibility-calendar': { visibility: Ti.Calendar.VISIBILITY_DEFAULT }
'.visibility-calendar-private': { visibility: Ti.Calendar.VISIBILITY_PRIVATE }
'.visibility-calendar-public': { visibility: Ti.Calendar.VISIBILITY_PUBLIC }
```
